cause.description:
To struggle for the overthrow of capitalism world-wide and the establishment of a classless society based upon worker's councils, soviets, and federations that place power in the hands of those that produce and maintain society.
To transform capital from something the vast majority toil to produce for the benefit of a tiny elite into something that benefits us all. Capital is created by society, it should serve those who produce it, not wielded as a weapon against them by a parasitic elite.
1. The destruction of all capitalist forms of production
2. To this end the self- conscious, independent movement of the immense majority, in the interest of the immense majority is required
3. The creation of a new society, a fundementally democratic society, that expunges all systems of repression
cause.name: World Revolution
